subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Since 1960, when Mickey and Ginny Cochran installed a ski lift behind their home in Vermont, all four of their children and six of their grandchildren have gone on to become elite skiers.
snippet: Since 1960, when Mickey and Ginny Cochran installed a ski lift behind their home in Vermont, all four of their children and six of their grandchildren have gone on to become elite skiers.
